name: Ritchie Bros
tag_list: auction, used-heavy-equipment, industrial-equipment, onsite, bidders, bid, trucks, construction, agricultural, tractors, trailers, forklifts, backhoes
overview:
<a href="http://www.rbauction.com?utmsource=crunchbase&utmmedium=seo&utmcampaign=directories>Ritchie Bros. Auctioneers</a> (NYSE and TSX: RBA) is the world’s largest industrial auctioneer for new and <a href="http://www.rbauction.com?utmsource=crunchbase&utmmedium=seo&utmcampaign=directories>used heavy equipment</a>.

They conduct hundreds of unreserved public auctions around the world each year, selling more equipment to on-site and online bidders than any other company in the world.
